alert.note: Alert for Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 10:21PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Val Verde County through 1045 PM CDT... At 1021 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northeast of Pandale, or 15 miles northwest of Juno, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Val Verde County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
